summary: After a San Francisco detective's partner is murdered by Northern Irish terrorists, the officer joins the bomb squad in order to bring them to justice.
cast: Tom Sizemore|Dennis Hopper|Steven Seagal|Jaime Pressly|Nas|Rozonda 'Chilli' Thomas|Peter Greene|Kevin Gage|Michael Halsey|Norbert Weisser|Romany Malco|Joe Spano|Mimi Rose|Tish Daniels|Linda Castro|Vanessa Branch|Simona Williams|Laurie Rose|Brandi Brandt|John Thompson|Stacie Randall|Ron Roggé|Joey Meyer Rosenblum|Yuji Okumoto|Fumiyasu Daikyu|Mariah O'Brien|Caleb LeConte|Damon Chandler|Daryle Jenewein|Jerry Rector|Clarence 'Gatemouth' Brown|Billy Preston|Marty Grebb|Leland Sklar|Joseph Modeliste|Penny Ford|Kimberly Brewer|Kaos Segal|Ice-T|Chris Astoyan|Vincent Klyn|Jenny McShane|Milos Milicevic
title: Tiempo límite
